explanation: [0-0] The animation begins with a background of colored hexagons, each with a flower-like structure in the center. In the center of the hexagonal structure, there is a green hexagon with an eye in it, surrounded by pointy triangles resembling teeth.

[0-7] The green hexagon begins rotating outwards from its position within the structure. With each step down, the surrounding hexagons open their flower-like gears revealing eyes within. The green hexagon continues to move to the right and is now on top of a blue hexagon. Now the green hexagon begins rotating outwards again, as before. Then the green hexagon is now on top of a purple hexagon, revealing an eye and "teeth." Finally the green hexagon continues to the right and is back in its initial position from the start of the animation. The animation loops here.
